verses.verse: Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3254>another<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
And she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him <S%H2175>Zimran<s%> and <S%H3370>Jokshan<s%> and <S%H4091>Medan<s%> and <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H3435>Ishbak<s%> and <S%H7774>Shuah.<s%>

And <S%H3370>Jokshan<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1719>Dedan<s%> were <S%H9037>Asshurim<s%> and <S%H3912>Letushim<s%> and <S%H3817>Leummim.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> [were] <S%H5891>Ephah<s%> and <S%H6081>Epher<s%> and <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%> and <S%H28>Abida<s%> and <S%H420>Eldaah.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he had to <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%>

but to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H6370>concubines,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> while he was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>living,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them <S%H7971>away<s%> from his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H9506>eastward,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are <S%H3117>all<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of Abraham's <S%H9132>life<s%> that he <S%H2421>lived,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and seventy-five <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1478>breathed<s%> his <S%H1478>last<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>ripe<s%> <S%H7872>old<s%> <S%H7872>age,<s%> an <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H2205>man<s%> and <S%H7649>satisfied<s%> [with life;] and he was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

Then his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H5921>facing<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%>

the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>purchased<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H6912>buried<s%> with <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> by Beer-lahai-roi.

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> Sarah's <S%H8198>maid,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to Abraham;

and <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> by their <S%H8034>names,<s%> in the <S%H8435>order<s%> of their <S%H8435>birth:<s%> <S%H5032>Nebaioth,<s%> the first-born of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> and <S%H110>Adbeel<s%> and <S%H4017>Mibsam<s%>
and <S%H4927>Mishma<s%> and <S%H1746>Dumah<s%> and <S%H4854>Massa,<s%>
<S%H2301>Hadad<s%> and <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> <S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> <S%H5305>Naphish<s%> and <S%H6929>Kedemah.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H8034>names,<s%> by their <S%H9161>villages,<s%> and by their <S%H2918>camps;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> according to their <S%H523>tribes.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H9132>life<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and thirty-seven <S%H8141>years;<s%> and he <S%H1478>breathed<s%> his <S%H1478>last<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

And they <S%H7931>settled<s%> from <S%H2341>Havilah<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>east<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as one <S%H935>goes<s%> toward <S%H804>Assyria;<s%> he <S%H5307>settled<s%> in <S%H5921>defiance<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>relatives.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1121>son:<s%> Abraham <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%>

and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Aramean<s%> of Paddan-aram, the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> the <S%H761>Aramean,<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H6279>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on <S%H5227>behalf<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she was <S%H6135>barren;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6279>answered<s%> him and <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2029>conceived.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H7533>struggled<s%> together <S%H7130>within<s%> her; and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> it is <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> then am I [this way?]" So she <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H8147>"Two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are in your <S%H990>womb;<s%> And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3816>peoples<s%> shall be <S%H6504>separated<s%> from your <S%H4578>body;<s%> And one <S%H3816>people<s%> shall be <S%H553>stronger<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H3816>other;<s%> And the <S%H7227>older<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H6810>younger.<s%>"
When her <S%H3117>days<s%> to be <S%H3205>delivered<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there were <S%H9639>twins<s%> in her <S%H990>womb.<s%>

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H132>red,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> over like a <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H155>garment;<s%> and they <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H6215>Esau.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H270>holding<s%> on to Esau's <S%H6119>heel,<s%> so his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when she <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to them.

When the <S%H5288>boys<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> up, <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H3045>skillful<s%> <S%H376>hunter,<s%> <S%H6718><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> but <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was a <S%H8535>peaceful<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H3427>living<s%> in <S%H168>tents.<s%>
Now <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he had a <S%H6310>taste<s%> for <S%H6718>game;<s%> but <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
And when <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> had <S%H2102>cooked<s%> <S%H5138>stew,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in from the <S%H7704>field<s%> and he was <S%H5889>famished;<s%>

and <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let me <S%H3938>have<s%> a <S%H3938>swallow<s%> of that <S%H122>red<s%> <S%H123>stuff<s%> there, for I am <S%H5889>famished.<s%>" <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H9000>Edom.<s%>
But <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3117>"First<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> me your <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>"
And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H1980>am<s%> <S%H1980>about<s%> to <S%H4191>die;<s%> so of <S%H4100>what<s%> [use] then is the <S%H1062>birthright<s%> to me?"
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3117>"First<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> to me"; so he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him, and <S%H4376>sold<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H5742>lentil<s%> <S%H5138>stew;<s%> and he <S%H398>ate<s%> and <S%H8354>drank,<s%> and <S%H6965>rose<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H1980>way.<s%> Thus <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H959>despised<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>
